specimenSource: Is your data from a commercially acquired organism or from an accessioned specimen (i.e., from a natural history collection)?
iDigBioAccessioned: Is your specimen's species in the iDigBio database?
developmentalStage: What is your specimen's developmental stage?
modality: What is the modality of the acquisition?
contrastEnhancement: Is there contrast enhancement treatment applied to the specimen (iodine, phosphotungstenic acid, gadolinium, casting agents, etc)?
anatomicalAreas: What anatomical area(s) is/are present in the scan?
redistributionAcknowledgement: I have the right to allow redistribution of this data.
license: CC BY 4.0 (requires attribution, allows commercial usage)
githubRepoName: What should the repository in your github account called? This needs to be unique value for your account.
